law.catch_line: The Department may deny an application for a facility permit if the Department finds that:...
law.text:
The Department may deny an application for a facility permit if the Department finds that:
The controlled hazardous substance facility cannot handle, treat, store, or dispose of a particular controlled hazardous substance without imposing an undue risk to the environment; or
The owner of the land or any person making application has violated:
Any law of this or any other state concerning controlled hazardous substances; or
Any rule or regulation or permit condition of this or any other state concerning controlled hazardous substances.
